   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Day Tripper's documentation!
=======================================


Welcome to our API documentation.

Day Tripper aims to automate itinerary planning for day trips. You can use our REST API to perform all of the functions required to create, edit, and delete itineraries.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   apidoc
